content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest at (15.5,72.5) storing iron ore (currently contains 15 iron ore)

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (-46.5,70.5) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-46.5,72.5) storing copper ore (currently contains 16 copper ore)

### Power Generation System at (-9.5,-0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,-0.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-5.0,-0.5) converting water to steam (currently has coal fuel)
- Steam engine at (-0.5,-0.5) generating electricity
- Pipe network connecting the components (currently not fully functional)

### Iron Smelting Operation at (16.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) extracting iron ore (fueled with coal)
- Stone furnace at (18.0,73.0) smelting iron ore (fueled with coal)
- Inserter at (16.5,72.5) transferring items
- Wooden chest at (19.5,73.5) for output

### Copper Mining Operation at (-46.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-46.0,71.0) extracting copper ore (fueled with coal)
- Wooden chest at (-46.5,72.5) storing copper ore

### New Smelting Setup at (25.0,70.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (25.0,70.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5,70.5) for input

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collisions
- Verify target position is clear before placing entities (furnaces, chests, inserters)
- Check for existing entities that might block placement
- Maintain proper spacing between components (1 tile minimum)

### Entity Retrieval Errors
- Confirm entity exists at target position before attempting to get it
- Verify correct entity type is being requested
- Check for typos in prototype names

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Ensure inserter placement locations have clear access to both source and destination
- Verify inserter can reach both input and output inventories
- Check for obstructions in inserter operating area

### Furnace Operation Problems
- Always verify furnaces have both fuel and input materials
- Check furnace status messages for warnings
- Ensure output inventory has space available

### Mining Drill Output Issues
- Verify drills have valid output destinations
- Check for blocked output positions
- Ensure output chests have available space

### Power System Placement Issues (from previous report)
- Steam engines cannot be placed on water tiles
- Maintain proper spacing (2 tiles) between boiler and steam engine
- Check for existing entities before placing new components

### Boiler Placement Problems (from previous report)
- Ensure boilers are placed on land, not water
- Verify clear space in all directions when placing boilers

### Water Source Verification (from previous report)
- Always verify water exists at target location before placing offshore pump
- Offshore pumps must be placed directly adjacent to water
